name: Poste.io
description: Full stack mail server solution with SSL TLS support. POP3s, SMTP(s), IMAPs, RSPAMD, Clamav, Roundcube(HTTPS), SPF, DKIM with easy installation and web administration.
longDescription: Full stack mail server solution with SSL TLS support. POP3s, SMTP(s), IMAPs, RSPAMD, Clamav, Roundcube(HTTPS), SPF, DKIM with easy installation and web administration.
